name: ​Scail an bhais
description:
Scail an bhais stands for Shadows of Death. This is a work in progress title for a bigger game project. It is highly recommended to play with headphones on and in the dark for a better experience. This was mostly a one man deal so I hope you enjoy it.

Summary:
You wake up in the middle of the forest, your head throbbing, and any recollection of how you got there is hazy. The fog is thick and surrounds you, you must find a way out. But beware, for you are not alone in this forest bathed in fog.

And tips are very appreciated too for support of a full version!

Report any odd situations that you encounter in the thick forest bathed in fog!

EDIT 1: Windows version reuploaded due to a menu screen bug.

EDIT 2: Long time huh? This update includes modified text, modified run delay, area alterations and Linux support.
